data.title: Borys Grinchenko Kyiv University: Tuition, Admissions, Rankings
data.text:
Borys Grinchenko Kyiv University is a student-centered educational institution with over 120 years of experience. It follows innovative teaching methods that allow students to have long-term learning and close links with numerous enterprises and businesses. The university highly promotes ethical and social values to its students with the hopes of developing professionals that are not just intelligent but also compassionate.

Borys Grinchenko Kyiv University Overview

Tuition Fees at Borys Grinchenko Kyiv University

Borys Grinchenko Kyiv University tuition fees for both bachelor's and master's students are discussed in this section.

Bachelor's Tuition Fees

Student Type Annual Tuition Fees in UAH International Students 129,200 UAH - 195,600 UAH

Master's Tuition Fees

Student Type Annual Tuition Fees in UAH International Students 232,500 UAH

Although this range provide a good estimate of tuition costs at Borys Grinchenko Kyiv University, the actual fees depend on your chosen program. Thus, for more exact figures, you may refer to Borys Grinchenko Kyiv University tuition fee pages.

Ready to save in tuition and study in Ukraine? Click here to read our guides to tuition fees and cheapest universities in Ukraine and start planning your dream education today.

Admissions At Borys Grinchenko Kyiv University

If you wish to study at Borys Grinchenko Kyiv University, you’ll need to know the admission process, requirements, and other relevant information. Those may vary based on the program you’re applying to Borys Grinchenko Kyiv University.

Moreover, the process and requirements for Borys Grinchenko Kyiv University international admission may differ from domestic admission. Thus, if you’re an international student, check what additional requirements you need to submit and how you can validate your academic credentials.

To help you find all the admission-related information, we’ve compiled the bachelor's and master's admission pages of Borys Grinchenko Kyiv University. Select which one applies to you and take note of the process and requirements.

Degree Admission Pages Bachelor's International Admissions Page Master's International Admissions Page

Planning to study in Ukraine?

From choosing your university to applying for your student visa, we know that studying abroad is not easy. However, we are here to support you every step of the way! Don't forget to explore our comprehensive guide as you prepare for your educational journey in Ukraine.
